raid_monster.reward_text: This strong monster wants to raid your city. Stop it before it reaches your town and kill it for a reward.
raid_monster.mon_appears:
{~red}Attention{~}

{~Yellow}A strong raiding monster appeared near the @color@ player's town!{~}
raid_monster.reward_message1:
{~r}A glorius victory{~}

Defeating the Raid Boss %Z-10 is rewared with some resources:
raid_monster.reward_message2:
{~r}A glorius victory{~}

Defeating the Raid Boss %Z-10 is rewared with a primary skill point:
raid_monster.reward_message3:
{~r}A glorius victory{~}

Defeating the Raid Boss %Z-10 gains some of the experience points required for the next level:
raid_monster.reward_message4:
{~r}A glorius victory{~}

Defeating the Raid Boss %Z-10 gets an artifact:
raid_monster.reward_message5:
{~r}A glorius victory{~}

Defeating the Raid Boss %Z-10 learns a new spell:
raid_monster.diff_header:
Select Raid Boss Difficulty
Right-click system options to call settings again
raid_monster.diff_level1: Normal - moderate stats scaling. Medium reward chance.
raid_monster.diff_level2: Hard - 150% stats scaling. High reward chance.
raid_monster.diff_level3: Extreme - 200% stats scaling. Very high reward chance, multiple rewards.
